title: ISic003430. I.Sicily inscription 003430
body:
Facsimile Images

1DM
2LOFFONIO
3LFFRUCTUOSO
4VIXITANNIS
5XIIIMENSV
6DIEBXIIIOFFO
7NIUSEUHELPISIUS
8FILIODULCISSIMO

Apparatus criticus

  • Text from autopsy

English translation

To the shades of the underworld, to Lucius Offonius Fructuosus, son of Lucius. He lived 13 years, 5 months, 13 days. Offonius Euhelpisius (set this up) for his most darling son.

commentary

bibliography

  • Gentili 1961 24-25 no.3 dr https://biblio.inscriptiones.org/epig10001955
  • Manganaro 2001 87 no.XI https://biblio.inscriptiones.org/epig10001806
